summary: Season One — Sorcerer's Stone — Harry Potter and the Sacred Text
title: Season One — Sorcerer's Stone — Harry Potter and the Sacred Text
excerpt: It’s the English class you didn't know you missed and the meaningful conversations you didn't know you craved.
description:
Podcast we’ve all been waiting for. 

This goes through chapter by chapter with the interpretation of themes. It looks at the characters and events in ways I hadn’t really though of before. 

It’s interesting to reflect back, being a “non-religious” person, realize that the Harry Potter series has always been sort of a stand in for religion. It’s been a family activity. I got my little sister into it when she was just learning how to read. It’s been a way to connect with people and friends, even if it is a silent acknowledgement that you’re “one of us”. And I know some of the values I have, the vision I have on how I want to live my life, has been influenced by the series. Or times I’ve felt consoled from their quotes and wisdom. Even my mom’s studied the homeliness and old world aesthetic presented of the wizarding world to figure out how to give that same feel in her own life and work.

This goes through chapter by chapter with the interpretation of themes. It looks at the characters and events in ways I hadn’t really though of before. 

It’s interesting to reflect back, being a “non-religious” person, realize that the Harry Potter series has always been sort of a stand in for religion. It’s been a family activity. I got my little sister into it when she was just learning how to read. It’s been a way to connect with people and friends, even if it is a silent acknowledgement that you’re “one of us”. And I know some of the values I have, the vision I have on how I want to live my life, has been influenced by the series. Or times I’ve felt consoled from their quotes and wisdom. Even my mom’s studied the homeliness and old world aesthetic presented of the wizarding world to figure out how to give that same feel in her own life and work.

summary: Hello love you‘re blog! (sorry for my englisch im from Europe). I wanted to ask for a Marauders erea and Marvel ship if thats...
question: Hello love you‘re blog! (sorry for my englisch im from Europe). I wanted to ask for a Marauders erea and Marvel ship if thats alright. So im 5,3 and have longish brown hair and my eyes are hazel. I am a bit of a shy person but when you get to know me i make a 360 tirn and become a sarcastic clumsy meme. im really into 70/80 bands and love reading but never really finish a book (or just read fanfiction). I love to rewatch every marvel movie or the punisher and i‘m a ravenclaw :)
answer:
(A/N: Your english is great sweetie don’t worry about it💕)

I ship you with….

Remus Lupin

Peter Parker

tags: fantastic beasts and where to find them
summary: On “Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald”
title: On “Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald”
body:
I don’t usually do movie reviews, but after experiencing a great deal of delight over surprising things in this film, I wanted to give it a bit of endorsement. I wouldn’t call myself an active Harry Potter fan, but I am very familiar with all the books and films and the controversies.

No, it ain’t perfect; the portrayal of Nagini was rather stereotypically orientalist and her character did not have much purpose and frankly, I think Johnny Depp wasn’t at his best, but…… Let me tell you why I think lots of people should see this. 

1. I think these two films feature a lovely depiction of an individual on the Spectrum who gets respected, lives the way he wants to, gets recognition for his talents and abilities and the usefulness of his niche interests (at least sometimes), who is not turned into a comic relief and who is allowed to be instead of being stepped around (this last genius description I borrowed from @tinysartorius) by the people close to him. In fact, at one point, it is stated that the way he is, who he is, makes him uniquely suited to go against evil. But, this doesn’t mean that he never struggles. Oh, he does. He is bothered by hugs, he doesn’t read between the lines, he gets frustrated by ableist rules, he worries about not being able to say anything sensible to his love interest. It’s not easy being him, but he’s never shown as being helpless or weak. He’s the hero of the damned story, and how many ASD characters are there like that, especially in films at least partly geared towards minors? (I also found highly endearing the facts that he has an older brother who works for the government who tries to get him to behave, and that he has curly hair and a nice coat he flips up the collars of *wink*)

2. All the beautiful tweed. SO MUCH TWEED that Mycroft Holmes would have an orgastic paroxysm.

3. Ballsy themes ranging from parental neglect to an older male sexual predator who gets away with shit because of his power and influence, and the way evil charismatic individuals seek to exploit those with mental health issues.

4. Beautiful locations and sets. Just gorgeous. Also did I mention the tweed?

5. Ezra Miller. He didn’t wear much tweed, though.

6. Lovely creatures (duh) who are used enough to warrant the title despite the plot not centering on them. Screen-writing wise I think they were used cleverly.

7. The films work as movies so particularly well, because they were written to be films. The original books were so damned full of stuff that adapting them must have been a nightmare. Now, nothing needs to be shown just so that fans wouldn’t complain it was missing. I cannot assess how much sense the movies would make to someone completely unacquainted with the HP universe but I daresay the Beasts films stand on their own relatively well.

8. It is sad that we’re still at a point where it’s progressive that a Hollywood film which many children will see includes a canon gay ship. It was less ambiguous than I expected, so points for that. And for Jude Law for a very nice performance as Dumbledore. I nearly didn’t recognise him.

summary:
hi so i have a grievance to discuss.
during GOF harry mentions that hermione and percy had always gotten along well together and...
body:
hi so i have a grievance to discuss.

during GOF harry mentions that hermione and percy had always gotten along well together and had been close to friends. so, in conclusion:

where is the headcannons of percy and hermione literally staying awake till 4 am discussing their favorite books?

wheres my headcannons of hermione and percy being total dorks in the common room laughing about some history of magic joke that nobody gets.

wheres my headcannons of after the war having hermione and percy finally be able to talk more (since she’d obviously have to drop by the weasleys for dinner often) and become friends again?

wheres my headcannons of hermione showing percy muggle fiction books and them bonding over book series and characters they like?

wHERES PERCY AND HERMIONE BEING ABSOLUTE BFFS??

summary: Magic Moments: A Weasley Twins One-shot
title: Magic Moments: A Weasley Twins One-shot
body:
Happy New Year, everyone!!! 

This is my Secret Santa gift to @rozenwaffle ! <3 Not MM, but I really love the Weasley twins! I hope you like it <3 

It was glorious.

The slow graceful motion of their youngest brother as the snowball thwacks against his cheek, the skin of his face rippling like a million ocean waves. The way his body free falls into the powdered snow, his open mouth being stuffed with beautiful white ice.

Fred and George snicker as they lean against the opposite sides of a tree, watching Ron fumble around, lifting his head and spitting snow out of his mouth.

“Fred! George! You foul gits!” Ron scrambles to his feet, eyes scanning the premises for the twins. When his eyes zone in on them, he’s too late. Another snowball arcs across the air and lands on his face, the impact and his unsteady footing making him fall into the icy sea again.

The twins let out a sigh and shake their heads in mock sadness.

“What do you think, George?”

“I dunno, Fred. This one seems to be lacking in the brains department.”

“Could it be because–”

“–we dropped him when he was a baby?”

Ron hobbles to his feet but the twins raise their wands and flick them towards their brother. Snow hovers into the air, forming two round balls before zooming towards the youngest male Weasley. Ron dodges one, but gets slammed right on his forehead with the other.

Fred sighs. “What.”

“A.”

“Disappointment,” both twins say together.

“Oh leave him alone. You two are bullies.” Ginny says as she passes by from feeding the chickens.

“We can’t help it.” Fred speaks up.

“He’s an easy target.” George pipes up.

“And besides…”

“He needs to toughen up.”

“Be a man.”

“Well he can also be a woman.”

“We’d still accept him.”

“Little Rona.”

“Ronnie.”

“Rosemary Alexandria Maria Dorothy Elizabeth Wumpykins.”

“The Third.”

Ginny shakes her head but she can’t help the smile at her older brothers’ antics. They are so silly, so outrageous. Two identical trouble-makers. Some twins strove hard to be different. But with Fred and George, they seemed to want to be identical in every way possible…if only to confuse and play pranks on the gullible victims.

Ron finally manages to get up and he scoops up a handful of snow, eyes focused on the two smirking faces gazing back at him. The twins aren’t even moving from their position, their postures relaxed as they stare down their brother, watching as Ron decided who he would aim for.

Ron’s gaze finally lands on George, but as the ball flies towards the younger twin, George merely ducks and straightens, the frozen slush landing on the ground behind him.

“Going to have to do better than that, Ron.”

Fred chuckles but suddenly his face feels cold, the shock of the cold ice making him push himself off the tree, running a hand down his face. Ginny is already scooping up another handful of snow, rolling it around her hands traditionally, without the use of magic.

“SABOTAGE!” George bellows, kicking off the tree and running to the side of the yard. He bends down as he runs, filling his hand with snow before chucking it behind him, at his sister.

But Ginny dodges it easily, sprinting across the snow in chase of her brother. She gasps though when ice hits the back of her neck, some of it rolling down her shirt.

“Don’t let your guard down, sis!” Fred snickers behind her, rolling another ball and aiming for Ron. Said Weasley is scooping up handfuls of snow, rolling them together to create a bigger counter-attack. However, when he throws it, Fred runs diagonally. Thus, Ron’s ball meets the ground once again.

Ron is further annoyed when he hears Fred and George’s laughs being carried by the wind. Quickening his pace, Ron closes the gap then hurls his body forward, tackling his older brother to the ground.

“Man down!” George shouts, doing a U-turn and running towards his two brothers, who were rolling around. Ginny hurls an attack at her brother and George lets out a strangled cry as the small round ball of ice hits his arm. “Another man down! Ahhhhh I’m hit, Fred!” George does a dramatic twirl then proceeds to free fall onto the powdery snow, making Ginny laugh at her brother’s antics.

“George, NOOOOO!” Fred exclaims just as dramatically. With renewed energy, he hurls his younger brother off him and crawls to his twin, the entire scene making the two younger Weasleys snort and chuckle.

“Go on without me, Fred.” George says, feigning a cough.

“No! Don’t talk like that, George! We still need to nick that singing cauldron from Filch’s office and place under Snape’s bed!”

“No…I…I can’t, Fred. It’s too late for me. You need to finish our lifelong goal…solo.”

“I won’t accept it! I won’t!” Fred clutches his brother’s body and Ginny is howling in laughter, clutching her stomach as tears slipped down her cheeks.

“Good…bye…Fred.” George closes his eyes and his body goes limp.

“NOOOOOOOO!” Fred roars in exaggerated slow motion, shaking his fist at the sky.

“Oy! Stop screaming I’m trying to sleep!” George tells him. In a heartbeat, the younger twin’s fingers form into a fist, snow trapped in his hands. Then he slams the ball into his brother’s face with a war-cry. Fred drops his twin’s body, the cold slush jolting his system. He spits out the snow that got into his mouth and scrambles to his feet, George already running towards the house.

“I’ll get you for this, George!”

Ron finally manages to land hits on his brothers, but by this point, the siblings are all laughing, tossing balls at each other.

There’s nothing particularly amazing about the moment. Having a snowball fight in the middle of winter is actually the most cliche activity that teenagers could do. But to the siblings, everything in that exact moment feels magical.

After sometime, the four Weasleys lay on their backs in the snow, each looking at the twilight sky. They’re catching their breaths, cheeks flushed, their clothes and hair dusted with snow. Fred found himself wishing for more moments like this…there’s something extraordinary in the most ordinary acts. And everyday should always be made into an extraordinary one.

“We should head back inside, mum will be calling for us soon.” Ginny remarks, sitting up and brushing off her coat.

“Yeah. I’m starving.” Ron adds, getting to his feet.

Fred and George are about to do the same when they hear a voice.

“What are you all doing there? You’ll drag snow into the house and you’ll have to clean up the mess,” comes Percy’s annoyed tone.

The twins look at each other. A mischievous smile is mirrored in each other’s faces —identical deviants.

“Say Percy…” Fred says, his hand slowly closing on the snow beneath him. George does the same.

“…would you care…”

“…for a…”

“…snowcone?”

The twins sit up, reel back their arm and throw their balls. Right into Percy’s irritated face.

It was glorious.  

The slow graceful motion of their uptight brother as the snowball thwacks against his cheek, the skin of his face rippling like a million ocean waves. The way his body free falls into the powdered snow, his open mouth being stuffed with beautiful white ice.

“Run for it, Fred!”

“Right behind you, George!”

Happy 2019, guys! :D Cherish every moment with loved ones <3

reblog.comment:
Happy New Year, everyone!!! 

This is my Secret Santa gift to @rozenwaffle ! <3 Not MM, but I really love the Weasley twins! I hope you like it <3 

[[MORE]]

It was glorious.

The slow graceful motion of their youngest brother as the snowball thwacks against his cheek, the skin of his face rippling like a million ocean waves. The way his body free falls into the powdered snow, his open mouth being stuffed with beautiful white ice.

Fred and George snicker as they lean against the opposite sides of a tree, watching Ron fumble around, lifting his head and spitting snow out of his mouth.

“Fred! George! You foul gits!” Ron scrambles to his feet, eyes scanning the premises for the twins. When his eyes zone in on them, he’s too late. Another snowball arcs across the air and lands on his face, the impact and his unsteady footing making him fall into the icy sea again.

The twins let out a sigh and shake their heads in mock sadness.

“What do you think, George?”

“I dunno, Fred. This one seems to be lacking in the brains department.”

“Could it be because–”

“–we dropped him when he was a baby?”

Ron hobbles to his feet but the twins raise their wands and flick them towards their brother. Snow hovers into the air, forming two round balls before zooming towards the youngest male Weasley. Ron dodges one, but gets slammed right on his forehead with the other.

Fred sighs. “What.”

“A.”

“Disappointment,” both twins say together.

“Oh leave him alone. You two are bullies.” Ginny says as she passes by from feeding the chickens.

“We can’t help it.” Fred speaks up.

“He’s an easy target.” George pipes up.

“And besides…”

“He needs to toughen up.”

“Be a man.”

“Well he can also be a woman.”

“We’d still accept him.”

“Little Rona.”

“Ronnie.”

“Rosemary Alexandria Maria Dorothy Elizabeth Wumpykins.”

“The Third.”

Ginny shakes her head but she can’t help the smile at her older brothers’ antics. They are so silly, so outrageous. Two identical trouble-makers. Some twins strove hard to be different. But with Fred and George, they seemed to want to be identical in every way possible…if only to confuse and play pranks on the gullible victims.

Ron finally manages to get up and he scoops up a handful of snow, eyes focused on the two smirking faces gazing back at him. The twins aren’t even moving from their position, their postures relaxed as they stare down their brother, watching as Ron decided who he would aim for.

Ron’s gaze finally lands on George, but as the ball flies towards the younger twin, George merely ducks and straightens, the frozen slush landing on the ground behind him.

“Going to have to do better than that, Ron.”

Fred chuckles but suddenly his face feels cold, the shock of the cold ice making him push himself off the tree, running a hand down his face. Ginny is already scooping up another handful of snow, rolling it around her hands traditionally, without the use of magic.

“SABOTAGE!” George bellows, kicking off the tree and running to the side of the yard. He bends down as he runs, filling his hand with snow before chucking it behind him, at his sister.

But Ginny dodges it easily, sprinting across the snow in chase of her brother. She gasps though when ice hits the back of her neck, some of it rolling down her shirt.

“Don’t let your guard down, sis!” Fred snickers behind her, rolling another ball and aiming for Ron. Said Weasley is scooping up handfuls of snow, rolling them together to create a bigger counter-attack. However, when he throws it, Fred runs diagonally. Thus, Ron’s ball meets the ground once again.

Ron is further annoyed when he hears Fred and George’s laughs being carried by the wind. Quickening his pace, Ron closes the gap then hurls his body forward, tackling his older brother to the ground.

“Man down!” George shouts, doing a U-turn and running towards his two brothers, who were rolling around. Ginny hurls an attack at her brother and George lets out a strangled cry as the small round ball of ice hits his arm. “Another man down! Ahhhhh I’m hit, Fred!” George does a dramatic twirl then proceeds to free fall onto the powdery snow, making Ginny laugh at her brother’s antics.

“George, NOOOOO!” Fred exclaims just as dramatically. With renewed energy, he hurls his younger brother off him and crawls to his twin, the entire scene making the two younger Weasleys snort and chuckle.

“Go on without me, Fred.” George says, feigning a cough.

“No! Don’t talk like that, George! We still need to nick that singing cauldron from Filch’s office and place under Snape’s bed!”

“No…I…I can’t, Fred. It’s too late for me. You need to finish our lifelong goal…solo.”

“I won’t accept it! I won’t!” Fred clutches his brother’s body and Ginny is howling in laughter, clutching her stomach as tears slipped down her cheeks.

“Good…bye…Fred.” George closes his eyes and his body goes limp.

“NOOOOOOOO!” Fred roars in exaggerated slow motion, shaking his fist at the sky.

“Oy! Stop screaming I’m trying to sleep!” George tells him. In a heartbeat, the younger twin’s fingers form into a fist, snow trapped in his hands. Then he slams the ball into his brother’s face with a war-cry. Fred drops his twin’s body, the cold slush jolting his system. He spits out the snow that got into his mouth and scrambles to his feet, George already running towards the house.

“I’ll get you for this, George!”

Ron finally manages to land hits on his brothers, but by this point, the siblings are all laughing, tossing balls at each other.

There’s nothing particularly amazing about the moment. Having a snowball fight in the middle of winter is actually the most cliche activity that teenagers could do. But to the siblings, everything in that exact moment feels magical.

After sometime, the four Weasleys lay on their backs in the snow, each looking at the twilight sky. They’re catching their breaths, cheeks flushed, their clothes and hair dusted with snow. Fred found himself wishing for more moments like this…there’s something extraordinary in the most ordinary acts. And everyday should always be made into an extraordinary one.

“We should head back inside, mum will be calling for us soon.” Ginny remarks, sitting up and brushing off her coat.

“Yeah. I’m starving.” Ron adds, getting to his feet.

Fred and George are about to do the same when they hear a voice.

“What are you all doing there? You’ll drag snow into the house and you’ll have to clean up the mess,” comes Percy’s annoyed tone.

The twins look at each other. A mischievous smile is mirrored in each other’s faces —identical deviants.

“Say Percy…” Fred says, his hand slowly closing on the snow beneath him. George does the same.

“…would you care…”

“…for a…”

“…snowcone?”

The twins sit up, reel back their arm and throw their balls. Right into Percy’s irritated face.

It was glorious.  

The slow graceful motion of their uptight brother as the snowball thwacks against his cheek, the skin of his face rippling like a million ocean waves. The way his body free falls into the powdered snow, his open mouth being stuffed with beautiful white ice.

“Run for it, Fred!”

“Right behind you, George!”

Happy 2019, guys! :D Cherish every moment with loved ones <3 

Mystic Messenger Masterlist

Original Works Masterlist

Ko-fi | Patreon | Commissions

blog.name: leavingwestcovina
blog.description: Formerly known as 2shytheshippy and LeftenantScullbagg. If we’re having a debate and I can no longer comment to you, I’m blocking your ass. I’m through with the bullshit.

summary:
For real tho, besides Harry and the war, what do Ron and hermione have in common?
I may be starting a war or not, but it’s...
body:
For real tho, besides Harry and the war, what do Ron and hermione have in common?

I may be starting a war or not, but it’s like….constantly saying opposites attract in no way explains them getting married and having kids.

It explains hooking up or dating, but long term dating, marriage, and kids???

There has to be something they have in common that they bond over.

And I’m not even sure why people claim that this relationship was cleverly written and was an unexpected surprise. I peeped this pairing at 9 years old, I’m now 27. It didn’t make sense to me back then and it doesn’t make sense today.

I know many were upset by Rowling saying they were only paired due to wish fulfillment, which makes sense, but…they weren’t well written regarding their build up or even as a couple. Then people try to position hermione as a prize because “finally, the guy got the girl.” And I’m wondering where the triangle was??? Ron didn’t deserve her because he was a sidekick that got to be with the other popular and beloved female character.

Rowling had to work for that shit and she didn’t.

And the bickering was not cute. I know some enjoyed it, but it wasn’t done well.

I’m not saying Ron wasn’t good enough for hermione or anything, im saying they were ill suited for each other. Realistically, their commonalities weren’t enough to sustain a long term relationship let alone a marriage.

Hell, I would’ve been fine if the story ended after the epilogue and hermione was unattached (hell, all of them for that matter).

Rowling was just not good at romances. Like, none of them.

summary:
You : Hey, i made this friendship bracelet for you
Sirius : I’m not really a bracelet person
You : Oh. um, you don’t have to...
body:
You : Hey, i made this friendship bracelet for you

Sirius : I’m not really a bracelet person

You : Oh. um, you don’t have to wear it

Sirius : No, i’m gonna wear it. Back off

blog.title: Tomarrymort On AO3
blog.description: An automated feed for the Tom/Harry and Voldemort/Harry AO3 tags. Not a fic recs blog.

summary: Heart's Desire
title: Heart's Desire
description:
by Apathetic Lambchoppi (Apathetic_Lambchoppi)

Harry Potter. War general. Husband. Boy-Who-Lived. Much had changed since the Battle at Hogwarts, and war was no game. Harry knew that all too well. When faced with his heart’s deepest desire, will he be able to turn away and do his duty? And will Voldemort let him?

AU from Harry’s trip into the Forbidden Forest.

Words: 1801, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Harry Potter, Voldemort, Lily Potter, James Potter, Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, Peter Pettigrew, Severus Snape, OC Children, Weasleys - Character, Tom Riddle | Voldemort, Albus Dumbledore
  • Relationships: James Potter/Lily Evans Potter, slight Harry Potter/Voldemort
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Dimension, onesided Voldemort/Harry Potter attraction, Powerful Harry, Not OP Harry though, Powerful Voldemort, He’s not weakened by Horcruxes, Harry Potter meets his Parents, War Hero Harry Potter, I plan to add tags and relationships as they appear
